name: Chat Interface
description: A WebSocket-based chat interface using JSON for the API schema.

components.name: Backend
components.description: The Go-based WebSocket server that provides the API endpoints and message handlers.

properties.name: WebSockets
properties.description: The WebSockets library used to implement the server.

properties.name: Gorilla WebSocket
properties.description: The Gorilla WebSocket library used to implement the server.

properties.name: API Schema
properties.description: The JSON-based API schema that defines the endpoints, message formats, and authentication mechanisms.

properties.name: Database
properties.description: The database used to store chat messages, user information, and other data.

methods.name: Connect
methods.description: The method used to establish a WebSocket connection between the client and server.

methods.name: HandleMessage
methods.description: The method used to handle incoming messages from the client, including chat messages, user authentication, and other API calls.

methods.name: SendMessage
methods.description: The method used to send chat messages and other data to the client over the WebSocket connection.

properties.description: The WebSocket-Client library used to implement the client.

properties.description: The JSON-based API schema that defines the endpoints, message formats, and authentication mechanisms.

properties.name: UI Framework
properties.description: The UI framework used to build the chat interface, such as PyQt, Tkinter, or Flask.

methods.name: Connect
